org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

接口 ResizableBlockCache

  • 所有超级接口:
    BlockCache, Iterable<CachedBlock>
    所有已知实现类:
    CombinedBlockCache, InclusiveCombinedBlockCache, LruBlockCache

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface ResizableBlockCache
extends BlockCache
    BlockCache which is resizable.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void setMaxSize(long size)
      Sets the max heap size that can be used by the BlockCache.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockCache

        cacheBlock, cacheBlock, evictBlock, evictBlocksByHfileName, getBlock, getBlockCaches, getBlockCount, getCurrentDataSize, getCurrentSize, getDataBlockCount, getFreeSize, getMaxSize, getStats, iterator, returnBlock, shutdown, size

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, spliterator

    • 方法详细资料

      • setMaxSize

        void setMaxSize(long size)
        Sets the max heap size that can be used by the BlockCache.
        参数:
        size - The max heap size.
